name: Magic: The Derezzing
description:
Welcome to MtD, the obvious successor to the slightly more popular MtG!

Build a library of cards by defeating the AI in brutal combat. Survive a battle system permanently tilted in your favor, and use the library interface to add your newly-won, leveled-up card to your hand... so you can do it again!

Credits

All graphics that don't suck are from Henry Software.

The font is m3x6 by the talented Daniel Linssen.
